pullrequest.title: Load SDF 1.7 even if there are errors

content.raw: I see what you're saying, I just worry that we may confuse users in cases where frame semantics is fine. Do you think we can print that error message at more specific times? I'm not sure which error codes could cause frame semantics to fail besides the `POSE_`, `JOINT_` and `FRAME_` ones.
content.html: I see what you're saying, I just worry that we may confuse users in cases where frame semantics is fine. Do you think we can print that error message at more specific times? I'm not sure which error codes could cause frame semantics to fail besides the POSE_, JOINT_ and FRAME_ ones.
